name: Fired Together
description:
We are currently restructuring the company and we need you to say goodbye to some employees, so we can keep our boat afloat!

_____________

Look at the demographic chart of our studio and influence it by firing people.

 - Follow the news feed to spare (or punish) the right group of people at the right time

- Keep a balance between popularity, productivity, and company wealth!

- Be aware that firing a person will impact the productivity of the company but will help you keep the company economically viable! - Don't worry! Recruitment sessions are sometimes made by the company to keep your productivity up and give you new employees to fire!
